name: Mind Thrust VI
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as mind thrust IV, but the target takes 1d8 points of damage per caster level (maximum 20d8) and is exhausted and stunned for 1 round if it fails its save. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同心灵戳刺 IV（Mind Thrust IV）一般，不过会受到每施法者等级1d8点伤害（最高20d8点），而且在豁免失败时还会力竭（exhausted）和震慑（stunned）1轮。该法术可以被降阶施法。
